02.Projects

Travelix

Travelix is a travel companion that displays local attractions and weather on the map in informative cards.
The app utilizes 3 APIs with the help of Axios and speed up the workflow with Material UI.

Built with: React.js, Axios, Material UI, RapidAPI

Shoppy Admin Dashboard

Shoppy is a responsive e-commerce admin dashboard with very advanced features
In this project I utilized Syncfusion, a Material UI alternative. With Syncfusion implementing advanced features (kanban board, calendar, unique charts) was a great experience.

Built with: React.js, Syncfusion, TailwindCSS

Foodie API App

With Foodie users can search for recipes, adjust serving sizes, as well as bookmark and add their own recipes.
The app utilizes a third-party API called forkify. The project architecture was based on the popular MVC pattern.

Built with: HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Javascipt, NPM, Parcel

CalendarJS App

CalendarJS is a calendar app, where users have the ability to add, edit, and delete events.
In this project I utilized multiple external libriaries to enhance the user exerience and accelarate my workflow.

Built with: HTML, CSS, Javascript, NPM, Parcel, UUID, Date-FNS
